overview: In the ultimate contest of pointlessness, 9 stone of man idiot takes on 11 stone of dog.  Round One: Singing Gangnam!  Round Two: Running!  Round Three: Pancake eating!  Who will win and prove themselves to be the chum-pion?
tagline: In the ultimate contest of pointlessness, 9 stone of man idiot takes on 11 stone of dog.
title: Man Vs. Dog
